page.title: 18Loop Farms
page.content: Loop farms, Higher and Lower, are on the boundary of Lytchett Matravers parish with Sturminster Marshall. Lower loop farm is a dairy and stock-raising farm with some arable and pasture and woodland.{Concern is {felt}over the{European attitudes to {farming. Higher Loop farm no longer has farmland attached. The old house and the buildings are ranged round a {square yard,}and the old house and barns are, in 1985, being converted into rather splendid, comfortable residences of character. The house is 19th century and the barns 18th century.
